mydescription: I am a devoted front-end engineer who likes creating responsive web applications. Most of the time, I use React.js with the Next.js framework and Tailwind CSS for styling the user interface. I am always trying to make the client experience on the front side as smooth as possible. Often, I work with the RESTful API endpoints for accessing and using data, so I am familiar with POST and GET requests. I like to use headless CMS like Strapi for data management. I have a good grasp of the React Context API and Redux for managing the state of web applications.
